name: CTRL/CMD+SHIFT+L - Set focus to center channel message box (with SEARCH RHS open)

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
CTRL/CMD+SHIFT+L - Set focus to center channel message box (with search RHS open)
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Search for something
  2. Press CTRL/CMD+SHIFT+L
inline.expectedResult: • Focus is set to center channel message box

customFields.Important notes about this step: One exception: If the right-hand sidebar is open and fully expanded in a message reply, then CTRL+SHIFT+L should set focus to the reply thread.
